---
title: Snowdon Jolly
category: climbing
tags: [snowdon,crib-goch,snowdon-horseshoe]
---
A two day jolly in Snowdon. Stayed at the awesome [Glen Aber Hotel](http://glanaberhotel.co.uk) in Betws-y-Coed. Day 1 we climbed Crib Goch through Carnedd Ugain and to the Snowdon Summit and descended via Y Lliwedd - "The Snowdon Horseshoe". Day 2 was a very quick ascent of Tryfan and a dash to London.
